distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for exempi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-12648: Fixed a NULL pointer dereference (crash) issue when processing webp files (bsc#1098946).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The WEBP::GetLE32 function in XMPFiles/source/FormatSupport/WEBP_Support.hpp in Exempi 2.4.5 has a NULL pointer dereference.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
